user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@advantagemedia.com) with customer insights that can help with our marketing campaign, and remind him to check his Gmail for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Customer Insights for Upcoming Campaign

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well.

When you have a chance, could you please send me the customer insights that will help shape our upcoming marketing campaign? You can reply directly to me at sarah@advantagemedia.com.

Also, please remember to check your Gmail inbox for the background materials I shared—they outline the specifics of the data we’re hoping to incorporate.

Thanks in advance for your help, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
Campaign Strategist | AdVantage Media

final_output:

Hi John,

Thanks in advance for your help, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson
